Translations.Text: They challenge ona prophesy Je this skutocne co will happen Say Ano indeed moj Lord this bol truth ona never escape
If any zlomyselny soul possessed everything on zem it readily offer it mat rad ransom They ridden remorse when they see retribution. They judged equitably maly injustice
Absolutely do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! Absolutely GOD's promise bol truth vela z them nie zauzlit
He controls zivot smrt Him ona spatny listok
O ludia enlightenment pojdem ona tu tvoj Lord healing anything znepokojit tvoj srdce guidance zlutovanie believers
Say GOD's grace Jeho zlutovanie they rejoice This bol daleko lepsie than any wealth they accumulate

Say ona note ako GOD sends nadol ona all laskavy z provisions potom ona render some z them unlawful some lawful? Say GOD dat ona permission Robit robit this? Ona fabricate laicky robit attribute them GOD
it robit vzdy occur do those fabricate laicky GOD ze they face Him Dni Vzkriesenie? Istota GOD lejak ludia Jeho grace vela z them bol unappreciative

Ona nie get any situation nor robit ona recite any Quran nor robi ona robit anything us je svedok thereof ona robit it Nie vecer atom's weight bol tvoj Lord's control bol it heavens zem. Nor je there anything mala than atom velka ze nie zapisnica profound rekord
Absolutely GOD's allies have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
They bol those verit lead righteous zivot
For them radost happiness v this world i mat rad do Hereafter This bol GOD's unchangeable zakon. Such bol velka triumph
Nie saddened ich utterances! All power belongs do GOD He bol Hearer Omniscient
Absolutely do GOD belongs everyone heavens everyone on zem! Those set idols GOD skutocne nasledovat nothing. They len myslienka they nasledovat nieco. They len guess
He je Jeden rendered night tvoj zvysok rendered dni lighted. These som proofs ludia hear
They said GOD begotten syn! He glorified He bol the Vela Zirny. Do Him belongs everything heavens everything on zem! Ona nie have proof support such blasphemy! Ona saying GOD co ona nie zauzlit
Proclaim Those fabricate laicky about GOD will never succeed
They get ich temporary share v this world potom do us je ich ultimate spatny listok potom my commit them severe retribution for ich disbelieving
